detectors.description:
RUBcontrakt.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RUBcontrakt.sol#21-28) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balanceOf[msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RUBcontrakt.sol#24)
	- balanceOf[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RUBcontrakt.sol#25)

detectors.description:
RUBcontrakt.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RUBcontrakt.sol#43-55) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- balanceOf[from] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RUBcontrakt.sol#50)
	- balanceOf[to] += value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RUBcontrakt.sol#51)
	- allowance[from][msg.sender] -= value (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/RUBcontrakt.sol#52)
